name: Catedral Santuario nuestra señora de las lajas

civilopediaText.text: El santurio es un templo y basílica para el culto católico y veneración de Nuestra Señora de Las Lajas un gran sentro de peregrinacion y una de las 7 maravillas de Colombia

name: Cafetales
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Culture, +1 Gold] from [in this city]
The Hacienda Cannot be build on Desert, Tundra nor Snow, only at Grassland/Plains Hills
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Monumento a Los Heroes
uniques: [+1 Culture] from [Hill] tiles [in this city] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [City center] tiles>
[+1 Science] from [Hill] tiles [in this city] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [City center] tiles> <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Mountain] tiles> <after discovering [Flight]>
Cost increases by [20] per owned city

civilopediaText.text: The classical main squares of Ecuador, dating back to the pre-colonial times, are between the best conserved of all Hispanic America, with over 300 years of existence, these plazas are a magnificent piece of history alive.
The vetiver plant growing has been mastered in the Haitian domains, leading it to be the top exporter of its oils, which are used for western cosmetics.

name: Platanera
uniques: [25]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city]
[+1 Production, +1 Food] from [Plantation] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Although it became a big industry thanks to colonialism, the Hondurans have turned it into a sign of national skill.

name: Fortaleza Naimana
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: This valiant gunners fought with 'tooth and nail' to defend their fatherland from 3 antagonist nations at the same time, managing impressive victories that give the people pride.
